jordan.szalontai.unicrush

Class LevelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jordan.szalontai.unicrush.LevelManager

  • public abstract class LevelManager
extends Object
    Class containing static methods that manage the logics of the levels.
    Author:
    Szalontai Jord√°n

      • LevelManager

        public LevelManager()

    • Method Detail

      • popAllMarked

        public static boolean popAllMarked(Level l)
        Refreshes the Candy.State of Candy instances in the level's board that are in a column or row with a length more than two.
        Parameters:
        l - the Level which contains the board of Candy instances
        Returns:
        true if a change happened in the board, false if did not

      • applyGravity

        public static long applyGravity(Level l)
        All Candy instances "fall" when there's empty space in their column.
        Parameters:
        l - the Level which contains the board
        Returns:
        60 multiplied by the number of Candy instances in Candy.State.EMPTY, multiplied by the number of blocks (one block = three or more Candy instances in a row or column)

      • processLevel

        public static int processLevel(Level l)
        Iterations of popping the matching Candy instances and then applying the gravity logic to the Level's board.

        We check how many iterations occurred, so this cannot be an infinite loop. It is important to be aware of the fact, that this method is changing the model of the Level given as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        l - the Level on which we do these iterations
        Returns:
        how many iterations occurred
        See Also:
        popAllMarked(jordan.szalontai.unicrush.Level), applyGravity(jordan.szalontai.unicrush.Level)

      • processLevelWithState

        public static long[] processLevelWithState(Level l,
                                           List<String> states)
        Iterations of popping the matching Candy instances and then applying the gravity logic to the Level's board.

        We check how many iterations occurred, so this cannot be an infinite loop and in addition we summarize the points that applyGravity returns. It is important to be aware of the fact, that this method is changing the model of the Level given as a parameter AND adding the given Level's boardState String to the given List<String>.

        Parameters:
        l - the Level on which we do these iterations
        states - the List<String> that will contain the boardState Strings after the iterations
        Returns:
        a long[] array representing how many iterations occurred and the sum of the points returned by applyGravity
        See Also:
        popAllMarked(jordan.szalontai.unicrush.Level), applyGravity(jordan.szalontai.unicrush.Level)

      • resetLevel

        public static void resetLevel(Level l)
        Utilizes the LevelBuilder to reset all Candy instances in a Level's board.

        The method fills the Level's board with the method implemented in the concrete builder classes.

        Parameters:
        l - the Level we are rebuilding
